scripts.dev: echo '=> Bundle JS' && npm run webpack && echo '=> Compile SASS' && npm run sass
scripts.dev_watch: npm run sass -- --watch | npm run webpack -- --watch
scripts.build: echo '=> Bundle JS' && npm run webpack -- -p && echo '=> Compile SASS' && npm run sass -- --style compressed
scripts.build_watch: npm run webpack -- --watch -p |  npm run sass -- --watch --style compressed
